seg.translation: Losing weight the right way with semi-smart scales
Smart weight loss with smart scales
Lose weight correctly with half-smart scales

seg.source: Ich besitze seit vier Wochen ein neues Spielzeug.
seg.translation: I have owned a new toy for four weeks now.
For four weeks, I have been the owner of a new toy.
I have had a new toy for four weeks.

seg.source: Eine Waage, die nicht nur mein Gewicht misst, sondern auch den Körperfettanteil.
seg.translation: Scales that weigh my body fat percentage as well as my weight.
It is a weighing scale which not only measures my weight, but also my body fat percentage.
A scale that measures not only my weight, but also the percentage of body fat.

seg.source: Auch Muskel- und Knochenmasse kann sie anzeigen.
seg.translation: Even muscle and bone mass can be displayed.
It can also display bone and muscle mass.
It can also indicate muscle and bone mass.

seg.source: Den Body-Mass-Index berechnet das Ding auch, aber der ist eher für die Würscht.
seg.translation: This thing also calculates my body mass index but that is rather useless anyway.
It can also calculate your BMI, but this measurement does not really tell you anything.
The thing also calculates the body mass index, but this is more for the sausages.

seg.source: Sagt er doch nichts darüber aus, ob ich Fett durch Muskeln ersetzt habe.
seg.translation: After all, it does not tell me whether I have been replacing fat with muscle.
It gives no indication if I have replaced fat with muscle.
It doesn't say anything about whether I've replaced fat with muscle.
